source.7f7787c3:
!mkdir resized

import os, sys
from PIL import Image, ImageOps

for filename in os.listdir('../input/animal-crossing-new-horizons-all-villagers/villagers/'):
    old_img = Image.open("../input/animal-crossing-new-horizons-all-villagers/villagers/" +filename)
    old_size = old_img.size
    size = (max(old_size), max(old_size))
    old_size = old_img.size
    img = Image.new("RGBA", size)
    img.paste(old_img, ((size[0]-old_size[0])//2,
                      (size[1]-old_size[1])//2))
    img = img.resize((128,128))
    img.save("./resized/" + filename)
